scripts.start-client2: REACT_APP_USER=user2 && cd client && PORT=3001 npm start
scripts.start-server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && cd src && python app.py
scripts.start: npm run start-client1 & npm run start-client2 & npm run start-server
scripts.install: cd client && npm i && cd .. && cd server && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
